title: Verbose logging fails after a while

labels.name: bug
labels.description: A problem with current functionality, as opposed to missing functionality (enhancement)

labels.name: frozen-due-to-age
labels.description: Issues closed and untouched for a long time, together with being locked for discussion

body:
Version: syncthing v0.11.8 (go1.4.2 linux-amd64 default) unknown-user@syncthing-builder 2015-06-07 10:57:26 UTC

at the beginning it worked like you can see on the first part and failed service repeats until I stop syncthing.
